text: Up at the League, says a friend, there had been one night a brisk
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: conversational discussion, as to what would happen on the Morrow of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Revolution, finally shading off into a vigorous statement by various
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: friends of their views on the future of the fully-developed new society.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Says our friend: Considering the subject, the discussion was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: good-tempered; for those present being used to public meetings and after-
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: lecture debates, if they did not listen to each others' opinions (which
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: could scarcely be expected of them), at all events did not always attempt
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to speak all together, as is the custom of people in ordinary polite
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: society when conversing on a subject which interests them.  For the rest,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: there were six persons present, and consequently six sections of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: party were represented, four of which had strong but divergent Anarchist
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: opinions.  One of the sections, says our friend, a man whom he knows very
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: well indeed, sat almost silent at the beginning of the discussion, but at
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: last got drawn into it, and finished by roaring out very loud, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: damning all the rest for fools; after which befel a period of noise, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: then a lull, during which the aforesaid section, having said good-night
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: very amicably, took his way home by himself to a western suburb, using
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the means of travelling which civilisation has forced upon us like a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: habit.  As he sat in that vapour-bath of hurried and discontented
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: humanity, a carriage of the underground railway, he, like others, stewed
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: discontentedly, while in self-reproachful mood he turned over the many
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: excellent and conclusive arguments which, though they lay at his fingers'
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ends, he had forgotten in the just past discussion.  But this frame of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: mind he was so used to, that it didn't last him long, and after a brief
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: discomfort, caused by disgust with himself for having lost his temper
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (which he was also well used to), he found himself musing on the subject-
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: matter of discussion, but still discontentedly and unhappily.  "If I
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: could but see a day of it," he said to himself; "if I could but see it!"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: As he formed the words, the train stopped at his station, five minutes'
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: walk from his own house, which stood on the banks of the Thames, a little
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: way above an ugly suspension bridge.  He went out of the station, still
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: discontented and unhappy, muttering "If I could but see it! if I could
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: but see it!" but had not gone many steps towards the river before (says
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: our friend who tells the story) all that discontent and trouble seemed to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: slip off him.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: It was a beautiful night of early winter, the air just sharp enough to be
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: refreshing after the hot room and the stinking railway carriage.  The
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wind, which had lately turned a point or two north of west, had blown the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sky clear of all cloud save a light fleck or two which went swiftly down
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the heavens.  There was a young moon halfway up the sky, and as the home-
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: farer caught sight of it, tangled in the branches of a tall old elm, he
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: could scarce bring to his mind the shabby London suburb where he was, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: he felt as if he were in a pleasant country place--pleasanter, indeed,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: than the deep country was as he had known it.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: He came right down to the river-side, and lingered a little, looking over
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the low wall to note the moonlit river, near upon high water, go swirling
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and glittering up to Chiswick Eyot: as for the ugly bridge below, he did
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: not notice it or think of it, except when for a moment (says our friend)
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it struck him that he missed the row of lights down stream.  Then he
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: turned to his house door and let himself in; and even as he shut the door
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to, disappeared all remembrance of that brilliant logic and foresight
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which had so illuminated the recent discussion; and of the discussion
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: itself there remained no trace, save a vague hope, that was now become a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: pleasure, for days of peace and rest, and cleanness and smiling goodwill.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: In this mood he tumbled into bed, and fell asleep after his wont, in two
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: minutes' time; but (contrary to his wont) woke up again not long after in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that curiously wide-awake condition which sometimes surprises even good
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sleepers; a condition under which we feel all our wits preternaturally
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sharpened, while all the miserable muddles we have ever got into, all the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: disgraces and losses of our lives, will insist on thrusting themselves
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: forward for the consideration of those sharpened wits.
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it: till the tale of his stupidities amused him, and the entanglements
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: before him, which he saw so clearly, began to shape themselves into an
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: amusing story for him.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: He heard one o'clock strike, then two and then three; after which he fell
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: asleep again.  Our friend says that from that sleep he awoke once more,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and afterwards went through such surprising adventures that he thinks
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that they should be told to our comrades, and indeed the public in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: general, and therefore proposes to tell them now.  But, says he, I think
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it would be better if I told them in the first person, as if it were
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: myself who had gone through them; which, indeed, will be the easier and
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: more natural to me, since I understand the feelings and desires of the
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: comrade of whom I am telling better than any one else in the world does.

text: Well, I awoke, and found that I had kicked my bedclothes off; and no
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wonder, for it was hot and the sun shining brightly.  I jumped up and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: washed and hurried on my clothes, but in a hazy and half-awake condition,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: as if I had slept for a long, long while, and could not shake off the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: weight of slumber.  In fact, I rather took it for granted that I was at
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: home in my own room than saw that it was so.

author: Morris, William

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of the room and out of the house; and my first feeling was a delicious
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: relief caused by the fresh air and pleasant breeze; my second, as I began
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to gather my wits together, mere measureless wonder: for it was winter
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: when I went to bed the last night, and now, by witness of the river-side
title:

author: Morris, William

text: trees, it was summer, a beautiful bright morning seemingly of early June.
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: high water, as last night I had seen it gleaming under the moon.

author: Morris, William

title:

author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance

title:

author: Morris, William

text: CHAPTER V: CHILDREN ON THE ROAD
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Past the Broadway there were fewer houses on either side.  We presently
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: crossed a pretty little brook that ran across a piece of land dotted over
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: with trees, and awhile after came to another market and town-hall, as we
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: should call it.  Although there was nothing familiar to me in its
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: surroundings, I knew pretty well where we were, and was not surprised
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: when my guide said briefly, "Kensington Market."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Just after this we came into a short street of houses: or rather, one
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: long house on either side of the way, built of timber and plaster, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: with a pretty arcade over the footway before it.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Quoth Dick: "This is Kensington proper.  People are apt to gather here
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: rather thick, for they like the romance of the wood; and naturalists
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: haunt it, too; for it is a wild spot even here, what there is of it; for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it does not go far to the south: it goes from here northward and west
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: right over Paddington and a little way down Notting Hill: thence it runs
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: north-east to Primrose Hill, and so on; rather a narrow strip of it gets
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: through Kingsland to Stoke-Newington and Clapton, where it spreads out
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: along the heights above the Lea marshes; on the other side of which, as
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: you know, is Epping Forest holding out a hand to it.  This part we are
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: just coming to is called Kensington Gardens; though why 'gardens' I don't
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: know."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: I rather longed to say, "Well, _I_ know"; but there were so many things
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: about me which I did _not_ know, in spite of his assumptions, that I
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: thought it better to hold my tongue.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: The road plunged at once into a beautiful wood spreading out on either
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: side, but obviously much further on the north side, where even the oaks
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and sweet chestnuts were of a good growth; while the quicker-growing
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: trees (amongst which I thought the planes and sycamores too numerous)
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: were very big and fine-grown.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: It was exceedingly pleasant in the dappled shadow, for the day was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: growing as hot as need be, and the coolness and shade soothed my excited
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: mind into a condition of dreamy pleasure, so that I felt as if I should
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: like to go on for ever through that balmy freshness.  My companion seemed
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to share in my feelings, and let the horse go slower and slower as he sat
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: inhaling the green forest scents, chief amongst which was the smell of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the trodden bracken near the wayside.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Romantic as this Kensington wood was, however, it was not lonely.  We
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: came on many groups both coming and going, or wandering in the edges of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the wood.  Amongst these were many children from six or eight years old
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: up to sixteen or seventeen.  They seemed to me to be especially fine
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: specimens of their race, and enjoying themselves to the utmost; some of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: them were hanging about little tents pitched on the greensward, and by
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: some of these fires were burning, with pots hanging over them gipsy
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fashion.  Dick explained to me that there were scattered houses in the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: forest, and indeed we caught a glimpse of one or two.  He said they were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: mostly quite small, such as used to be called cottages when there were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: slaves in the land, but they were pleasant enough and fitting for the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wood.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "They must be pretty well stocked with children," said I, pointing to the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: many youngsters about the way.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "O," said he, "these children do not all come from the near houses, the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: woodland houses, but from the country-side generally.  They often make up
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: parties, and come to play in the woods for weeks together in summer-time,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: living in tents, as you see.  We rather encourage them to it; they learn
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to do things for themselves, and get to notice the wild creatures; and,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: you see, the less they stew inside houses the better for them.  Indeed, I
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: must tell you that many grown people will go to live in the forests
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: through the summer; though they for the most part go to the bigger ones,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: like Windsor, or the Forest of Dean, or the northern wastes.  Apart from
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the other pleasures of it, it gives them a little rough work, which I am
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sorry to say is getting somewhat scarce for these last fifty years."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: He broke off, and then said, "I tell you all this, because I see that if
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: I talk I must be answering questions, which you are thinking, even if you
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: are not speaking them out; but my kinsman will tell you more about it."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: I saw that I was likely to get out of my depth again, and so merely for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the sake of tiding over an awkwardness and to say something, I said--
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well, the youngsters here will be all the fresher for school when the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: summer gets over and they have to go back again."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "School?" he said; "yes, what do you mean by that word?  I don't see how
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it can have anything to do with children.  We talk, indeed, of a school
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of herring, and a school of painting, and in the former sense we might
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: talk of a school of children--but otherwise," said he, laughing, "I must
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: own myself beaten."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Hang it! thought I, I can't open my mouth without digging up some new
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: complexity.  I wouldn't try to set my friend right in his etymology; and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: I thought I had best say nothing about the boy-farms which I had been
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: used to call schools, as I saw pretty clearly that they had disappeared;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: so I said after a little fumbling, "I was using the word in the sense of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: a system of education."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Education?" said he, meditatively, "I know enough Latin to know that the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: word must come from _educere_, to lead out; and I have heard it used; but
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: I have never met anybody who could give me a clear explanation of what it
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: means."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: You may imagine how my new friends fell in my esteem when I heard this
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: frank avowal; and I said, rather contemptuously, "Well, education means a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: system of teaching young people."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Why not old people also?" said he with a twinkle in his eye.  "But," he
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: went on, "I can assure you our children learn, whether they go through a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: 'system of teaching' or not.  Why, you will not find one of these
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: children about here, boy or girl, who cannot swim; and every one of them
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: has been used to tumbling about the little forest ponies--there's one of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: them now!  They all of them know how to cook; the bigger lads can mow;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: many can thatch and do odd jobs at carpentering; or they know how to keep
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: shop.  I can tell you they know plenty of things."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes, but their mental education, the teaching of their minds," said I,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: kindly translating my phrase.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Guest," said he, "perhaps you have not learned to do these things I have
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: been speaking about; and if that's the case, don't you run away with the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: idea that it doesn't take some skill to do them, and doesn't give plenty
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of work for one's mind: you would change your opinion if you saw a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Dorsetshire lad thatching, for instance.  But, however, I understand you
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to be speaking of book-learning; and as to that, it is a simple affair.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Most children, seeing books lying about, manage to read by the time they
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: are four years old; though I am told it has not always been so.  As to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: writing, we do not encourage them to scrawl too early (though scrawl a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: little they will), because it gets them into a habit of ugly writing; and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: what's the use of a lot of ugly writing being done, when rough printing
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: can be done so easily.  You understand that handsome writing we like, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: many people will write their books out when they make them, or get them
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: written; I mean books of which only a few copies are needed--poems, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: such like, you know.  However, I am wandering from my lambs; but you must
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: excuse me, for I am interested in this matter of writing, being myself a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fair-writer."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well," said I, "about the children; when they know how to read and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: write, don't they learn something else--languages, for instance?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Of course," he said; "sometimes even before they can read, they can talk
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: French, which is the nearest language talked on the other side of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: water; and they soon get to know German also, which is talked by a huge
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: number of communes and colleges on the mainland.  These are the principal
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: languages we speak in these islands, along with English or Welsh, or
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Irish, which is another form of Welsh; and children pick them up very
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: quickly, because their elders all know them; and besides our guests from
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: over sea often bring their children with them, and the little ones get
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: together, and rub their speech into one another."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Take Oxford, for instance," said I.
title:

author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes," said he, "I suppose Oxford was beautiful even in the nineteenth
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: century.  At present it has the great interest of still preserving a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: great mass of pre-commercial building, and is a very beautiful place, yet
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: there are many towns which have become scarcely less beautiful."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said I: "In passing, may I ask if it is still a place of learning?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Still?" said he, smiling.  "Well, it has reverted to some of its best
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: traditions; so you may imagine how far it is from its nineteenth-century
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: position.  It is real learning, knowledge cultivated for its own sake--the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Art of Knowledge, in short--which is followed there, not the Commercial
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: learning of the past.  Though perhaps you do not know that in the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: nineteenth century Oxford and its less interesting sister Cambridge
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: became definitely commercial.  They (and especially Oxford) were the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: breeding places of a peculiar class of parasites, who called themselves
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: cultivated people; they were indeed cynical enough, as the so-called
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: educated classes of the day generally were; but they affected an
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: exaggeration of cynicism in order that they might be thought knowing and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: worldly-wise.  The rich middle classes (they had no relation with the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: working classes) treated them with the kind of contemptuous toleration
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: with which a mediaeval baron treated his jester; though it must be said
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that they were by no means so pleasant as the old jesters were, being, in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fact, _the_ bores of society.  They were laughed at, despised--and paid.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Which last was what they aimed at."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest

title:

author: Morris, William

text: Dear me! thought I, how apt history is to reverse contemporary judgments.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Surely only the worst of them were as bad as that.  But I must admit that
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: they were mostly prigs, and that they _were_ commercial.  I said aloud,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: though more to myself than to Hammond, "Well, how could they be better
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: than the age that made them?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "True," he said, "but their pretensions were higher."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Were they?" said I, smiling.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "You drive me from corner to corner," said he, smiling in turn.  "Let me
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: say at least that they were a poor sequence to the aspirations of Oxford
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of 'the barbarous Middle Ages.'"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes, that will do," said I.

News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Also," said Hammond, "what I have been saying of them is true in the
title:

author: Morris, William

text: main.  But ask on!"

author: Morris, William

News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest

author: Morris, William

text: I said: "We have heard about London and the manufacturing districts and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the ordinary towns: how about the villages?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said Hammond: "You must know that toward the end of the nineteenth
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: century the villages were almost destroyed, unless where they became mere
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: adjuncts to the manufacturing districts, or formed a sort of minor
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: manufacturing districts themselves.  Houses were allowed to fall into
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: decay and actual ruin; trees were cut down for the sake of the few
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: shillings which the poor sticks would fetch; the building became
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: inexpressibly mean and hideous.  Labour was scarce; but wages fell
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: nevertheless.  All the small country arts of life which once added to the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: little pleasures of country people were lost.  The country produce which
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: passed through the hands of the husbandmen never got so far as their
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: mouths.  Incredible shabbiness and niggardly pinching reigned over the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fields and acres which, in spite of the rude and careless husbandry of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the times, were so kind and bountiful.  Had you any inkling of all this?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "I have heard that it was so," said I "but what followed?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "The change," said Hammond, "which in these matters took place very early
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: in our epoch, was most strangely rapid.  People flocked into the country
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: villages, and, so to say, flung themselves upon the freed land like a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wild beast upon his prey; and in a very little time the villages of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: England were more populous than they had been since the fourteenth
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: century, and were still growing fast.  Of course, this invasion of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: country was awkward to deal with, and would have created much misery, if
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the folk had still been under the bondage of class monopoly.  But as it
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: was, things soon righted themselves.  People found out what they were fit
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: for, and gave up attempting to push themselves into occupations in which
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: they must needs fail.  The town invaded the country; but the invaders,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: like the warlike invaders of early days, yielded to the influence of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: their surroundings, and became country people; and in their turn, as they
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: became more numerous than the townsmen, influenced them also; so that the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: difference between town and country grew less and less; and it was indeed
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: this world of the country vivified by the thought and briskness of town-
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: bred folk which has produced that happy and leisurely but eager life of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which you have had a first taste.  Again I say, many blunders were made,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: but we have had time to set them right.  Much was left for the men of my
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: earlier life to deal with.  The crude ideas of the first half of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: twentieth century, when men were still oppressed by the fear of poverty,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and did not look enough to the present pleasure of ordinary daily life,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: spoilt a great deal of what the commercial age had left us of external
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: beauty: and I admit that it was but slowly that men recovered from the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: injuries that they inflicted on themselves even after they became free.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: But slowly as the recovery came, it _did_ come; and the more you see of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: us, the clearer it will be to you that we are happy.  That we live amidst
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: beauty without any fear of becoming effeminate; that we have plenty to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: do, and on the whole enjoy doing it.  What more can we ask of life?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: He paused, as if he were seeking for words with which to express his
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: thought.  Then he said:
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "This is how we stand.  England was once a country of clearings amongst
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the woods and wastes, with a few towns interspersed, which were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fortresses for the feudal army, markets for the folk, gathering places
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: for the craftsmen.  It then became a country of huge and foul workshops
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and fouler gambling-dens, surrounded by an ill-kept, poverty-stricken
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: farm, pillaged by the masters of the workshops.  It is now a garden,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: where nothing is wasted and nothing is spoilt, with the necessary
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: dwellings, sheds, and workshops scattered up and down the country, all
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: trim and neat and pretty.  For, indeed, we should be too much ashamed of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ourselves if we allowed the making of goods, even on a large scale, to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: carry with it the appearance, even, of desolation and misery.  Why, my
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: friend, those housewives we were talking of just now would teach us
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: better than that."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said I: "This side of your change is certainly for the better.  But
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: though I shall soon see some of these villages, tell me in a word or two
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: what they are like, just to prepare me."

News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest

author: Morris, William

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: as they were before the end of the nineteenth century.  Such things
title:

text: exist."

author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest

author: Morris, William

text: "I have seen several of such pictures," said I.

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well," said Hammond, "our villages are something like the best of such
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: places, with the church or mote-house of the neighbours for their chief
title:

author: Morris, William

text: building.  Only note that there are no tokens of poverty about them: no
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: tumble-down picturesque; which, to tell you the truth, the artist usually
title:

author: Morris, William

text: availed himself of to veil his incapacity for drawing architecture.  Such
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest

author: Morris, William

text: things do not please us, even when they indicate no misery.  Like the
title:

author: Morris, William

text: mediaevals, we like everything trim and clean, and orderly and bright; as
title:

title:

author: Morris, William

text: any nonsense from Nature in their dealings with her."

author: Morris, William

title:

title:

title:

text: necessarily husbandmen; though they almost all help in such work at

text: instance, did the English Government defend the English citizen against
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the French?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  So it was said.
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  Then if the French had invaded England and conquered it, they would
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: not have allowed the English workmen to live well?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I, laughing)  As far as I can make out, the English masters of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: English workmen saw to that: they took from their workmen as much of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: their livelihood as they dared, because they wanted it for themselves.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  But if the French had conquered, would they not have taken more
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: still from the English workmen?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  I do not think so; for in that case the English workmen would have
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: died of starvation; and then the French conquest would have ruined the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: French, just as if the English horses and cattle had died of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: under-feeding.  So that after all, the English _workmen_ would have been
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: no worse off for the conquest: their French Masters could have got no
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: more from them than their English masters did.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  This is true; and we may admit that the pretensions of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: government to defend the poor (_i.e._, the useful) people against other
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: countries come to nothing.  But that is but natural; for we have seen
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: already that it was the function of government to protect the rich
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: against the poor.  But did not the government defend its rich men against
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: other nations?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  I do not remember to have heard that the rich needed defence;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: because it is said that even when two nations were at war, the rich men
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of each nation gambled with each other pretty much as usual, and even
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sold each other weapons wherewith to kill their own countrymen.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  In short, it comes to this, that whereas the so-called government
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of protection of property by means of the law-courts meant destruction of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wealth, this defence of the citizens of one country against those of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: another country by means of war or the threat of war meant pretty much
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the same thing.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  I cannot deny it.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  Therefore the government really existed for the destruction of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wealth?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  So it seems.  And yet--
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  Yet what?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  There were many rich people in those times.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  You see the consequences of that fact?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  I think I do.  But tell me out what they were.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  If the government habitually destroyed wealth, the country must
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: have been poor?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  Yes, certainly.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  Yet amidst this poverty the persons for the sake of whom the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: government existed insisted on being rich whatever might happen?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  So it was.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  What must happen if in a poor country some people insist on being
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: rich at the expense of the others?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  Unutterable poverty for the others.  All this misery, then, was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: caused by the destructive government of which we have been speaking?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  Nay, it would be incorrect to say so.  The government itself was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: but the necessary result of the careless, aimless tyranny of the times;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it was but the machinery of tyranny.  Now tyranny has come to an end, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: we no longer need such machinery; we could not possibly use it since we
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: are free.  Therefore in your sense of the word we have no government.  Do
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: you understand this now?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (I)  Yes, I do.  But I will ask you some more questions as to how you as
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: free men manage your affairs.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: (H.)  With all my heart.  Ask away.
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William
