text: CHAPTER XII: CONCERNING THE ARRANGEMENT OF LIFE
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well," I said, "about those 'arrangements' which you spoke of as taking
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the place of government, could you give me any account of them?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Neighbour," he said, "although we have simplified our lives a great deal
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: from what they were, and have got rid of many conventionalities and many
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sham wants, which used to give our forefathers much trouble, yet our life
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: is too complex for me to tell you in detail by means of words how it is
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: arranged; you must find that out by living amongst us.  It is true that I
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: can better tell you what we don't do, than what we do do."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well?" said I.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "This is the way to put it," said he: "We have been living for a hundred
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and fifty years, at least, more or less in our present manner, and a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: tradition or habit of life has been growing on us; and that habit has
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: become a habit of acting on the whole for the best.  It is easy for us to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: live without robbing each other.  It would be possible for us to contend
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: with and rob each other, but it would be harder for us than refraining
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: from strife and robbery.  That is in short the foundation of our life and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: our happiness."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Whereas in the old days," said I, "it was very hard to live without
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: strife and robbery.  That's what you mean, isn't it, by giving me the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: negative side of your good conditions?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes," he said, "it was so hard, that those who habitually acted fairly
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to their neighbours were celebrated as saints and heroes, and were looked
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: up to with the greatest reverence."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "While they were alive?" said I.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "No," said he, "after they were dead."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "But as to these days," I said; "you don't mean to tell me that no one
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ever transgresses this habit of good fellowship?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Certainly not," said Hammond, "but when the transgressions occur,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: everybody, transgressors and all, know them for what they are; the errors
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of friends, not the habitual actions of persons driven into enmity
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: against society."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "I see," said I; "you mean that you have no 'criminal' classes."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "How could we have them," said he, "since there is no rich class to breed
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: enemies against the state by means of the injustice of the state?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said I: "I thought that I understood from something that fell from you a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: little while ago that you had abolished civil law.  Is that so,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: literally?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "It abolished itself, my friend," said he.  "As I said before, the civil
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: law-courts were upheld for the defence of private property; for nobody
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ever pretended that it was possible to make people act fairly to each
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: other by means of brute force.  Well, private property being abolished,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: all the laws and all the legal 'crimes' which it had manufactured of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: course came to an end.  Thou shalt not steal, had to be translated into,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Thou shalt work in order to live happily.  Is there any need to enforce
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that commandment by violence?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well," said I, "that is understood, and I agree with it; but how about
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: crimes of violence? would not their occurrence (and you admit that they
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: occur) make criminal law necessary?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said he: "In your sense of the word, we have no criminal law either.  Let
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: us look at the matter closer, and see whence crimes of violence spring.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: By far the greater part of these in past days were the result of the laws
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of private property, which forbade the satisfaction of their natural
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: desires to all but a privileged few, and of the general visible coercion
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which came of those laws.  All that cause of violent crime is gone.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Again, many violent acts came from the artificial perversion of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sexual passions, which caused overweening jealousy and the like miseries.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Now, when you look carefully into these, you will find that what lay at
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the bottom of them was mostly the idea (a law-made idea) of the woman
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: being the property of the man, whether he were husband, father, brother,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: or what not.  That idea has of course vanished with private property, as
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: well as certain follies about the 'ruin' of women for following their
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: natural desires in an illegal way, which of course was a convention
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: caused by the laws of private property.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Another cognate cause of crimes of violence was the family tyranny,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which was the subject of so many novels and stories of the past, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which once more was the result of private property.  Of course that is
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: all ended, since families are held together by no bond of coercion, legal
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: or social, but by mutual liking and affection, and everybody is free to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: come or go as he or she pleases.  Furthermore, our standards of honour
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and public estimation are very different from the old ones; success in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: besting our neighbours is a road to renown now closed, let us hope for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ever.  Each man is free to exercise his special faculty to the utmost,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and every one encourages him in so doing.  So that we have got rid of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: scowling envy, coupled by the poets with hatred, and surely with good
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: reason; heaps of unhappiness and ill-blood were caused by it, which with
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: irritable and passionate men--_i.e._, energetic and active men--often led
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to violence."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: I laughed, and said: "So that you now withdraw your admission, and say
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that there is no violence amongst you?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "No," said he, "I withdraw nothing; as I told you, such things will
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: happen.  Hot blood will err sometimes.  A man may strike another, and the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: stricken strike back again, and the result be a homicide, to put it at
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the worst.  But what then?  Shall we the neighbours make it worse still?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Shall we think so poorly of each other as to suppose that the slain man
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: calls on us to revenge him, when we know that if he had been maimed, he
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: would, when in cold blood and able to weigh all the circumstances, have
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: forgiven his manner?  Or will the death of the slayer bring the slain man
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to life again and cure the unhappiness his loss has caused?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes," I said, "but consider, must not the safety of society be
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: safeguarded by some punishment?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "There, neighbour!" said the old man, with some exultation "You have hit
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the mark.  That _punishment_ of which men used to talk so wisely and act
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: so foolishly, what was it but the expression of their fear?  And they had
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: need to fear, since they--_i.e._, the rulers of society--were dwelling
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: like an armed band in a hostile country.  But we who live amongst our
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: friends need neither fear nor punish.  Surely if we, in dread of an
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: occasional rare homicide, an occasional rough blow, were solemnly and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: legally to commit homicide and violence, we could only be a society of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ferocious cowards.  Don't you think so, neighbour?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes, I do, when I come to think of it from that side," said I.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yet you must understand," said the old man, "that when any violence is
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: committed, we expect the transgressor to make any atonement possible to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: him, and he himself expects it.  But again, think if the destruction or
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: serious injury of a man momentarily overcome by wrath or folly can be any
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: atonement to the commonwealth?  Surely it can only be an additional
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: injury to it."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said I: "But suppose the man has a habit of violence,--kills a man a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: year, for instance?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Such a thing is unknown," said he.  "In a society where there is no
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: punishment to evade, no law to triumph over, remorse will certainly
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: follow transgression."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "And lesser outbreaks of violence," said I, "how do you deal with them?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: for hitherto we have been talking of great tragedies, I suppose?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said Hammond: "If the ill-doer is not sick or mad (in which case he must
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: be restrained till his sickness or madness is cured) it is clear that
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: grief and humiliation must follow the ill-deed; and society in general
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: will make that pretty clear to the ill-doer if he should chance to be
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: dull to it; and again, some kind of atonement will follow,--at the least,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: an open acknowledgement of the grief and humiliation.  Is it so hard to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: say, I ask your pardon, neighbour?--Well, sometimes it is hard--and let
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it be."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "You think that enough?" said I.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes," said he, "and moreover it is all that we _can_ do.  If in addition
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: we torture the man, we turn his grief into anger, and the humiliation he
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: would otherwise feel for _his_ wrong-doing is swallowed up by a hope of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: revenge for _our_ wrong-doing to him.  He has paid the legal penalty, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: can 'go and sin again' with comfort.  Shall we commit such a folly, then?
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Remember Jesus had got the legal penalty remitted before he said 'Go and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sin no more.'  Let alone that in a society of equals you will not find
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: any one to play the part of torturer or jailer, though many to act as
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: nurse or doctor."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "So," said I, "you consider crime a mere spasmodic disease, which
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: requires no body of criminal law to deal with it?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Pretty much so," said he; "and since, as I have told you, we are a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: healthy people generally, so we are not likely to be much troubled with
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: _this_ disease."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well, you have no civil law, and no criminal law.  But have you no laws
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of the market, so to say--no regulation for the exchange of wares? for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: you must exchange, even if you have no property."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said he: "We have no obvious individual exchange, as you saw this morning
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: when you went a-shopping; but of course there are regulations of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: markets, varying according to the circumstances and guided by general
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: custom.  But as these are matters of general assent, which nobody dreams
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of objecting to, so also we have made no provision for enforcing them:
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: therefore I don't call them laws.  In law, whether it be criminal or
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: civil, execution always follows judgment, and someone must suffer.  When
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: you see the judge on his bench, you see through him, as clearly as if he
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: were made of glass, the policeman to emprison, and the soldier to slay
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: some actual living person.  Such follies would make an agreeable market,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wouldn't they?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Certainly," said I, "that means turning the market into a mere battle-
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: field, in which many people must suffer as much as in the battle-field of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: bullet and bayonet.  And from what I have seen I should suppose that your
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: marketing, great and little, is carried on in a way that makes it a
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: pleasant occupation."

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "You are right, neighbour," said he.  "Although there are so many, indeed
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: by far the greater number amongst us, who would be unhappy if they were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: not engaged in actually making things, and things which turn out
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: beautiful under their hands,--there are many, like the housekeepers I was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: speaking of, whose delight is in administration and organisation, to use
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: long-tailed words; I mean people who like keeping things together,
title:

author: Morris, William

text: avoiding waste, seeing that nothing sticks fast uselessly.  Such people
title:

title:

author: Morris, William

text: was the business of the commercial folk in past days.  Well, what are you

author: Morris, William

text: going to ask me next?"

text: Said I: "How do you manage with politics?"
title:

author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said Hammond, smiling: "I am glad that it is of _me_ that you ask that
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: question; I do believe that anybody else would make you explain yourself,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: or try to do so, till you were sickened of asking questions.  Indeed, I
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: believe I am the only man in England who would know what you mean; and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: since I know, I will answer your question briefly by saying that we are
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: very well off as to politics,--because we have none.  If ever you make a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: book out of this conversation, put this in a chapter by itself, after the
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: model of old Horrebow's Snakes in Iceland."

title:

title:

title:

text: society."

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: will find plenty of variety: the landscape, the building, the diet, the
title:

author: Morris, William

text: amusements, all various.  The men and women varying in looks as well as
title:

text: in habits of thought; the costume far more various than in the commercial
title:

author: Morris, William

text: period.  How should it add to the variety or dispel the dulness, to
title:

author: Morris, William

title:

title:

author: Morris, William

title:

author: Morris, William

title:

text: serviceable and pleasant to each other, without in the least wanting to
title:

title:

title:

title:

title:

text: readily appeased."

title:

author: Morris, William

text: differences of opinion in one and the same community.  Do you assert that
title:

author: Morris, William

text: there are none?"

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance

title:

author: Morris, William

text: differences of opinion about real solid things need not, and with us do
title:

title:

text: of time.  Isn't that what politics used to mean?"

title:

author: Morris, William

text: difference of opinion; for if it had existed they could not have dealt
title:

author: Morris, William

text: together in the ordinary business of life; couldn't have eaten together,
title:

author: Morris, William

text: bought and sold together, gambled together, cheated other people
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: together, but must have fought whenever they met: which would not have
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: suited them at all.  The game of the masters of politics was to cajole or
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: force the public to pay the expense of a luxurious life and exciting
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest

author: Morris, William

text: amusement for a few cliques of ambitious persons: and the _pretence_ of
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: serious difference of opinion, belied by every action of their lives, was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: quite good enough for that.  What has all that got to do with us?"

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

author: Morris, William

text: told that political strife was a necessary result of human nature."

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Human nature!" cried the old boy, impetuously; "what human nature?  The
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: human nature of paupers, of slaves, of slave-holders, or the human nature
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of wealthy freemen?  Which?  Come, tell me that!"
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well," said I, "I suppose there would be a difference according to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: circumstances in people's action about these matters."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "I should think so, indeed," said he.  "At all events, experience shows
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that it is so.  Amongst us, our differences concern matters of business,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and passing events as to them, and could not divide men permanently.  As
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: a rule, the immediate outcome shows which opinion on a given subject is
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the right one; it is a matter of fact, not of speculation.  For instance,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it is clearly not easy to knock up a political party on the question as
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to whether haymaking in such and such a country-side shall begin this
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: week or next, when all men agree that it must at latest begin the week
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: after next, and when any man can go down into the fields himself and see
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: whether the seeds are ripe enough for the cutting."

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Said I: "And you settle these differences, great and small, by the will
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of the majority, I suppose?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Certainly," said he; "how else could we settle them?  You see in matters
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which are merely personal which do not affect the welfare of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: community--how a man shall dress, what he shall eat and drink, what he
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: shall write and read, and so forth--there can be no difference of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: opinion, and everybody does as he pleases.  But when the matter is of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: common interest to the whole community, and the doing or not doing
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: something affects everybody, the majority must have their way; unless the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: minority were to take up arms and show by force that they were the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: effective or real majority; which, however, in a society of men who are
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: free and equal is little likely to happen; because in such a community
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the apparent majority _is_ the real majority, and the others, as I have
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: hinted before, know that too well to obstruct from mere pigheadedness;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: especially as they have had plenty of opportunity of putting forward
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: their side of the question."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "How is that managed?" said I.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Well," said he, "let us take one of our units of management, a commune,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: or a ward, or a parish (for we have all three names, indicating little
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: real distinction between them now, though time was there was a good
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: deal).  In such a district, as you would call it, some neighbours think
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that something ought to be done or undone: a new town-hall built; a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: clearance of inconvenient houses; or say a stone bridge substituted for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: some ugly old iron one,--there you have undoing and doing in one.  Well,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: at the next ordinary meeting of the neighbours, or Mote, as we call it,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: according to the ancient tongue of the times before bureaucracy, a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: neighbour proposes the change, and of course, if everybody agrees, there
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: is an end of discussion, except about details.  Equally, if no one backs
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the proposer,--'seconds him,' it used to be called--the matter drops for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the time being; a thing not likely to happen amongst reasonable men,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: however, as the proposer is sure to have talked it over with others
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: before the Mote.  But supposing the affair proposed and seconded, if a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: few of the neighbours disagree to it, if they think that the beastly iron
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: bridge will serve a little longer and they don't want to be bothered with
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: building a new one just then, they don't count heads that time, but put
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: off the formal discussion to the next Mote; and meantime arguments _pro_
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and _con_ are flying about, and some get printed, so that everybody knows
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: what is going on; and when the Mote comes together again there is a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: regular discussion and at last a vote by show of hands.  If the division
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: is a close one, the question is again put off for further discussion; if
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the division is a wide one, the minority are asked if they will yield to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the more general opinion, which they often, nay, most commonly do.  If
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: they refuse, the question is debated a third time, when, if the minority
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: has not perceptibly grown, they always give way; though I believe there
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: is some half-forgotten rule by which they might still carry it on
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: further; but I say, what always happens is that they are convinced, not
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: perhaps that their view is the wrong one, but they cannot persuade or
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: force the community to adopt it."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Very good," said I; "but what happens if the divisions are still
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: narrow?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: cases, the question must then lapse, and the majority, if so narrow, has
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to submit to sitting down under the _status quo_.  But I must tell you
title:

author: Morris, William

text: that in point of fact the minority very seldom enforces this rule, but
title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Nor was that altogether without a warrant: the spread of communistic
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: theories, and the partial practice of State Socialism had at first
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: disturbed, and at last almost paralysed the marvellous system of commerce
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: under which the old world had lived so feverishly, and had produced for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: some few a life of gambler's pleasure, and for many, or most, a life of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: mere misery: over and over again came 'bad times' as they were called,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and indeed they were bad enough for the wage-slaves.  The year 1952 was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: one of the worst of these times; the workmen suffered dreadfully: the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: partial, inefficient government factories, which were terribly jobbed,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: all but broke down, and a vast part of the population had for the time
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: being to be fed on undisguised "charity" as it was called.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "The Combined Workers watched the situation with mingled hope and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: anxiety.  They had already formulated their general demands; but now by a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: solemn and universal vote of the whole of their federated societies, they
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: insisted on the first step being taken toward carrying out their demands:
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: this step would have led directly to handing over the management of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: whole natural resources of the country, together with the machinery for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: using them into the power of the Combined Workers, and the reduction of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the privileged classes into the position of pensioners obviously
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: dependent on the pleasure of the workers.  The 'Resolution,' as it was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: called, which was widely published in the newspapers of the day, was in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fact a declaration of war, and was so accepted by the master class.  They
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: began henceforward to prepare for a firm stand against the 'brutal and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ferocious communism of the day,' as they phrased it.  And as they were in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: many ways still very powerful, or seemed so to be; they still hoped by
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: means of brute force to regain some of what they had lost, and perhaps in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the end the whole of it.  It was said amongst them on all hands that it
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: had been a great mistake of the various governments not to have resisted
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: sooner; and the liberals and radicals (the name as perhaps you may know
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of the more democratically inclined part of the ruling classes) were much
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: blamed for having led the world to this pass by their mis-timed pedantry
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and foolish sentimentality: and one Gladstone, or Gledstein (probably,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: judging by this name, of Scandinavian descent), a notable politician of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the nineteenth century, was especially singled out for reprobation in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: this respect.  I need scarcely point out to you the absurdity of all
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: this.  But terrible tragedy lay hidden behind this grinning through a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: horse-collar of the reactionary party.  'The insatiable greed of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: lower classes must be repressed'--'The people must be taught a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: lesson'--these were the sacramental phrases current amongst the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: reactionists, and ominous enough they were."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: The old man stopped to look keenly at my attentive and wondering face;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and then said:
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "I know, dear guest, that I have been using words and phrases which few
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: people amongst us could understand without long and laborious
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: explanation; and not even then perhaps.  But since you have not yet gone
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to sleep, and since I am speaking to you as to a being from another
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: planet, I may venture to ask you if you have followed me thus far?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "O yes," said I, "I quite understand: pray go on; a great deal of what
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: you have been saying was common place with us--when--when--"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes," said he gravely, "when you were dwelling in the other planet.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Well, now for the crash aforesaid.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "On some comparatively trifling occasion a great meeting was summoned by
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the workmen leaders to meet in Trafalgar Square (about the right to meet
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: in which place there had for years and years been bickering).  The civic
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: bourgeois guard (called the police) attacked the said meeting with
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: bludgeons, according to their custom; many people were hurt in the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: _melee_, of whom five in all died, either trampled to death on the spot,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: or from the effects of their cudgelling; the meeting was scattered, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: some hundred of prisoners cast into gaol.  A similar meeting had been
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: treated in the same way a few days before at a place called Manchester,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which has now disappeared.  Thus the 'lesson' began.  The whole country
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: was thrown into a ferment by this; meetings were held which attempted
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: some rough organisation for the holding of another meeting to retort on
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the authorities.  A huge crowd assembled in Trafalgar Square and the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: neighbourhood (then a place of crowded streets), and was too big for the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: bludgeon-armed police to cope with; there was a good deal of dry-blow
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fighting; three or four of the people were killed, and half a score of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: policemen were crushed to death in the throng, and the rest got away as
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: they could.  This was a victory for the people as far as it went.  The
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: next day all London (remember what it was in those days) was in a state
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of turmoil.  Many of the rich fled into the country; the executive got
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: together soldiery, but did not dare to use them; and the police could not
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: be massed in any one place, because riots or threats of riots were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: everywhere.  But in Manchester, where the people were not so courageous
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: or not so desperate as in London, several of the popular leaders were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: arrested.  In London a convention of leaders was got together from the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Federation of Combined Workmen, and sat under the old revolutionary name
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of the Committee of Public Safety; but as they had no drilled and armed
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: body of men to direct, they attempted no aggressive measures, but only
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: placarded the walls with somewhat vague appeals to the workmen not to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: allow themselves to be trampled upon.  However, they called a meeting in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Trafalgar Square for the day fortnight of the last-mentioned skirmish.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Meantime the town grew no quieter, and business came pretty much to an
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: end.  The newspapers--then, as always hitherto, almost entirely in the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: hands of the masters--clamoured to the Government for repressive
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: measures; the rich citizens were enrolled as an extra body of police, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: armed with bludgeons like them; many of these were strong, well-fed, full-
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: blooded young men, and had plenty of stomach for fighting; but the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Government did not dare to use them, and contented itself with getting
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: full powers voted to it by the Parliament for suppressing any revolt, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: bringing up more and more soldiers to London.  Thus passed the week after
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the great meeting; almost as large a one was held on the Sunday, which
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: went off peaceably on the whole, as no opposition to it was offered, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: again the people cried 'victory.'  But on the Monday the people woke up
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to find that they were hungry.  During the last few days there had been
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: groups of men parading the streets asking (or, if you please, demanding)
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: money to buy food; and what for goodwill, what for fear, the richer
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: people gave them a good deal.  The authorities of the parishes also (I
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: haven't time to explain that phrase at present) gave willy-nilly what
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: provisions they could to wandering people; and the Government, by means
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of its feeble national workshops, also fed a good number of half-starved
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: folk.  But in addition to this, several bakers' shops and other provision
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: stores had been emptied without a great deal of disturbance.  So far, so
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: good.  But on the Monday in question the Committee of Public Safety, on
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the one hand afraid of general unorganised pillage, and on the other
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: emboldened by the wavering conduct of the authorities, sent a deputation
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: provided with carts and all necessary gear to clear out two or three big
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: provision stores in the centre of the town, leaving papers with the shop
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: managers promising to pay the price of them: and also in the part of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: town where they were strongest they took possession of several bakers'
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: shops and set men at work in them for the benefit of the people;--all of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: which was done with little or no disturbance, the police assisting in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: keeping order at the sack of the stores, as they would have done at a big
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: fire.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "But at this last stroke the reactionaries were so alarmed, that they
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: were, determined to force the executive into action.  The newspapers next
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: day all blazed into the fury of frightened people, and threatened the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: people, the Government, and everybody they could think of, unless 'order
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: were at once restored.'  A deputation of leading commercial people waited
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: on the Government and told them that if they did not at once arrest the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Committee of Public Safety, they themselves would gather a body of men,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: arm them, and fall on 'the incendiaries,' as they called them.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "They, together with a number of the newspaper editors, had a long
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: interview with the heads of the Government and two or three military men,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the deftest in their art that the country could furnish.  The deputation
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: came away from that interview, says a contemporary eye-witness, smiling
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and satisfied, and said no more about raising an anti-popular army, but
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: that afternoon left London with their families for their country seats or
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: elsewhere.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "The next morning the Government proclaimed a state of siege in London,--a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: thing common enough amongst the absolutist governments on the Continent,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: but unheard-of in England in those days.  They appointed the youngest and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: cleverest of their generals to command the proclaimed district; a man who
