Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: treat with these men, who somehow had obtained dominion over people's
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: minds, while the formal rulers had no hold except over their bodies.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: There is no need at present to go into the details of the truce (for such
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it was) between these high contracting parties, the Government of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: empire of Great Britain and a handful of working-men (as they were called
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: in scorn in those days), amongst whom, indeed, were some very capable and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: 'square-headed' persons, though, as aforesaid, the abler men were not
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: then the recognised leaders.  The upshot of it was that all the definite
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: claims of the people had to be granted.  We can now see that most of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: these claims were of themselves not worth either demanding or resisting;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: but they were looked on at that time as most important, and they were at
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: least tokens of revolt against the miserable system of life which was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: then beginning to tumble to pieces.  One claim, however, was of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: utmost immediate importance, and this the Government tried hard to evade;
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: but as they were not dealing with fools, they had to yield at last.  This
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: was the claim of recognition and formal status for the Committee of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Public Safety, and all the associations which it fostered under its wing.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: This it is clear meant two things: first, amnesty for 'the rebels,' great
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: and small, who, without a distinct act of civil war, could no longer be
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: attacked; and next, a continuance of the organised revolution.  Only one
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: point the Government could gain, and that was a name.  The dreadful
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: revolutionary title was dropped, and the body, with its branches, acted
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: under the respectable name of the 'Board of Conciliation and its local
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: offices.'  Carrying this name, it became the leader of the people in the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: civil war which soon followed."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "O," said I, somewhat startled, "so the civil war went on, in spite of
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: all that had happened?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "So it was," said he.  "In fact, it was this very legal recognition which
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: made the civil war possible in the ordinary sense of war; it took the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: struggle out of the element of mere massacres on one side, and endurance
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: plus strikes on the other."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "And can you tell me in what kind of way the war was carried on?" said I.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Yes" he said; "we have records and to spare of all that; and the essence
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of them I can give you in a few words.  As I told you, the rank and file
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: of the army was not to be trusted by the reactionists; but the officers
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: generally were prepared for anything, for they were mostly the very
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: stupidest men in the country.  Whatever the Government might do, a great
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: part of the upper and middle classes were determined to set on foot a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: counter revolution; for the Communism which now loomed ahead seemed quite
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: unendurable to them.  Bands of young men, like the marauders in the great
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: strike of whom I told you just now, armed themselves and drilled, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: began on any opportunity or pretence to skirmish with the people in the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: streets.  The Government neither helped them nor put them down, but stood
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: by, hoping that something might come of it.  These 'Friends of Order,' as
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: they were called, had some successes at first, and grew bolder; they got
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: many officers of the regular army to help them, and by their means laid
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: hold of munitions of war of all kinds.  One part of their tactics
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: consisted in their guarding and even garrisoning the big factories of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: period: they held at one time, for instance, the whole of that place
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: called Manchester which I spoke of just now.  A sort of irregular war was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: carried on with varied success all over the country; and at last the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: Government, which at first pretended to ignore the struggle, or treat it
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: as mere rioting, definitely declared for 'the Friends of Order,' and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: joined to their bands whatsoever of the regular army they could get
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: together, and made a desperate effort to overwhelm 'the rebels,' as they
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: were now once more called, and as indeed they called themselves.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "It was too late.  All ideas of peace on a basis of compromise had
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: disappeared on either side.  The end, it was seen clearly, must be either
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: absolute slavery for all but the privileged, or a system of life founded
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: on equality and Communism.  The sloth, the hopelessness, and if I may say
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: so, the cowardice of the last century, had given place to the eager,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: restless heroism of a declared revolutionary period.  I will not say that
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the people of that time foresaw the life we are leading now, but there
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: was a general instinct amongst them towards the essential part of that
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: life, and many men saw clearly beyond the desperate struggle of the day
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: into the peace which it was to bring about.  The men of that day who were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: on the side of freedom were not unhappy, I think, though they were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: harassed by hopes and fears, and sometimes torn by doubts, and the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: conflict of duties hard to reconcile."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "But how did the people, the revolutionists, carry on the war?  What were
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the elements of success on their side?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: I put this question, because I wanted to bring the old man back to the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: definite history, and take him out of the musing mood so natural to an
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: old man.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: He answered: "Well, they did not lack organisers; for the very conflict
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: itself, in days when, as I told you, men of any strength of mind cast
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: away all consideration for the ordinary business of life, developed the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: necessary talent amongst them.  Indeed, from all I have read and heard, I
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: much doubt whether, without this seemingly dreadful civil war, the due
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: talent for administration would have been developed amongst the working
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: men.  Anyhow, it was there, and they soon got leaders far more than equal
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to the best men amongst the reactionaries.  For the rest, they had no
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: difficulty about the material of their army; for that revolutionary
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: instinct so acted on the ordinary soldier in the ranks that the greater
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: part, certainly the best part, of the soldiers joined the side of the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: people.  But the main element of their success was this, that wherever
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the working people were not coerced, they worked, not for the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: reactionists, but for 'the rebels.'  The reactionists could get no work
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: done for them outside the districts where they were all-powerful: and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: even in those districts they were harassed by continual risings; and in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: all cases and everywhere got nothing done without obstruction and black
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: looks and sulkiness; so that not only were their armies quite worn out
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: with the difficulties which they had to meet, but the non-combatants who
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: were on their side were so worried and beset with hatred and a thousand
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: little troubles and annoyances that life became almost unendurable to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: them on those terms.  Not a few of them actually died of the worry; many
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: committed suicide.  Of course, a vast number of them joined actively in
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: the cause of reaction, and found some solace to their misery in the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: eagerness of conflict.  Lastly, many thousands gave way and submitted to
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: 'the rebels'; and as the numbers of these latter increased, it at last
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: became clear to all men that the cause which was once hopeless, was now
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: triumphant, and that the hopeless cause was that of slavery and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: privilege."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

author: Morris, William

text: CHAPTER XVIII: THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW LIFE
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest

title:

title:

author: Morris, William

text: "Well," said I, "so you got clear out of all your trouble.  Were people
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: satisfied with the new order of things when it came?"
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "People?" he said.  "Well, surely all must have been glad of peace when
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: it came; especially when they found, as they must have found, that after
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: all, they--even the once rich--were not living very badly.  As to those
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: who had been poor, all through the war, which lasted about two years,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: their condition had been bettering, in spite of the struggle; and when
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: peace came at last, in a very short time they made great strides towards
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: a decent life.  The great difficulty was that the once-poor had such a
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: feeble conception of the real pleasure of life: so to say, they did not
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: ask enough, did not know how to ask enough, from the new state of things.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: It was perhaps rather a good than an evil thing that the necessity for
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: restoring the wealth destroyed during the war forced them into working at
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: first almost as hard as they had been used to before the Revolution.  For
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: all historians are agreed that there never was a war in which there was
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: so much destruction of wares, and instruments for making them as in this
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: civil war."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "I am rather surprised at that," said I.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Are you?  I don't see why," said Hammond.
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: "Why," I said, "because the party of order would surely look upon the
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: wealth as their own property, no share of which, if they could help it,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: should go to their slaves, supposing they conquered.  And on the other
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: hand, it was just for the possession of that wealth that 'the rebels'
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: were fighting, and I should have thought, especially when they saw that
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: they were winning, that they would have been careful to destroy as little

News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: rest in store for the world, when mastery has changed into fellowship--but
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: not before.  Go back again, then, and while you live you will see all
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: round you people engaged in making others live lives which are not their
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: own, while they themselves care nothing for their own real lives--men who
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: hate life though they fear death.  Go back and be the happier for having
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: seen us, for having added a little hope to your struggle.  Go on living
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: while you may, striving, with whatsoever pain and labour needs must be,
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: to build up little by little the new day of fellowship, and rest, and
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: happiness."
title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:
News from Nowhere; Or, An Epoch of Rest
Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

title:

Being Some Chapters from a Utopian Romance
author: Morris, William

text: called a vision rather than a dream.
